```{r}
library(terra)
grid <- rast("../../../grid/outputs/grid_250m.tif")
if(!dir.exists("inputs")){dir.create("inputs")}
if(!dir.exists("outputs")){dir.create("outputs")}
source("../../_functions/resint.R") # Script for resampling
```

# Use cost distance to measure distance to rivers
```{r}
riv <- vect("inputs/_ags_Rivers_1/Rivers_1.shp")
temp <- grid
values(temp) <- 1

riv <- rasterize(riv, temp, field = 1)
temp[riv == 1] <- 99
cd <- costDist(temp, target = 99)
cd <- cd*grid

writeRaster(cd, "outputs/distance_to_rivers_250m.tif", overwrite = TRUE, 
            datatype = "FLT4S", gdal=c("COMPRESS=ZSTD", "PREDICTOR=2"))
```
